title: Murder in Mind
description: From a New York Times & USA Today bestselling author ... If you were given a second chance to catch your sister's killer--would a lifetime behind bars be justice enough, or would you make him pay, with his life?MEET SLOANEPrivate Investigator Sloane Monroe has solved every case that's come across her desk with the exception of one--the brutal murder of her sister Gabrielle.Three years have passed without a trace of the killer until today, when a young woman's body is discovered in front of the local supermarket. Now Sloane is faced with the most difficult challenge of her life--finding a man who's a master at concealing his identity before he kills again.MEET SAMPark City, Utah was a peaceful place until Sinnerman came to town.Enter the mind of Sam Reids, a serial killer who slashes his trademark letter S into the wrist of his female victims before he discards their body in the same place he found them.Who is he, and why does he prey on innocent women?
author: Cheryl Bradshaw
